subject: Re: Order #SSN5269 confirmed
description_text:
Hi, i made my order on december 25th (10 days ago) and still have no email
confirming that my order has been sent and providing me with a tracking
code.

I want you to please confirm me if my order has been shipped already and
provide me with the tracking code.

I await your answer,

Thank you.
Ferran.

conversations.body_text: 3 days and i had 0 answers on your side.... If you don't say anything i will cancel the payment via Paypal.

Well, given that you have given me 0 answer in 2 weeks and the order still
shows as unfulfilled in your website with me having no tracking number for
the order, i claimed my payment to Paypal. You have not done anything since
December 25th when i made my order, that is unacceptable.

El mié, 7 ene 2026 a las 13:48, service@simsonn.com (

Hi Ferran Muñoz,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.  Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Hi Ferran Muñoz,     We will arrange UPS Express expedited shipping for you. Should any taxes or fees apply, we will cover a portion of them.
